Posts.EditableText: Right, I've uploaded some demo's to my server. It's right here: http://www.compwhizz.freeserve.co.uk/asldemos/ There's a few there, and I have more to upload soon. They are little bit's and pieces to do various things, go have a look, and report anything bad back to me. [Edit] I have actually just made a gravity demo thingy, which I like quite alot .. It's nothing real fancy, but I just got into the idea to do it. It also shows a mistake (by me) that msg <|n> doesn't actually add one new line - but two, so I had to quickly add |xn onto the end. [Edit2] Actually, I LURVE my Gravity 2 demo... It makes it kinda looke like a scrolling graph thingy... Like a tectometer or whatever it is that measures tectonic movements. Very nice . It wouldn't be that hard to alter it to be like a heart-meter, and I'm thinking I'll use stuff like this in my game, which will be neat-o .
